column1: This is the 52nd in the series of ‘Annual Statistical Reports’ published by the Sri Lanka
Tourism Development Authority (SLTDA). The reports were designed to provide data
on  Sri  Lanka’s  tourism  industry  on  a  consistent  basis,  which  is  useful  for  both  for
